mapper.sql: /* commonSearchColumns */ "no" AS "no", "title" AS "title", "user_id" AS "userId", "classification" AS "classification", "use_yn" AS "useYn", "content" AS "content", "file_name" as "fileName", "file_path" as "filePath", "file_size" as "fileSize", "created" AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul' AS "created", "lastmodified" AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul' AS "lastModified"

/* procSearch */
AND (SELECT value FROM code_detail WHERE key = classification AND group_id = 'DOCUMENTS_CLASSIFICATION') LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND lower(title) LIKE lower(concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%'))
AND lower(user_id) LIKE lower(concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%'))
AND (lower(title) LIKE lower(concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')) OR lower(user_id) LIKE lower(concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')) OR (SELECT value FROM code_detail WHERE key = classification AND group_id = 'DOCUMENTS_CLASSIFICATION') LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%'))
AND (lower(title) LIKE lower(concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')) OR lower(file_name) LIKE lower(concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')) OR (SELECT value FROM code_detail WHERE key = classification AND group_id = 'DOCUMENTS_CLASSIFICATION') LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%'))
AND 1=1
AND created >= to_date(#{searchStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS')
AND to_date(#{searchEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS')+1 >= created
AND use_yn = #{searchTypeUseYn}
AND 1=1
mapper.select:
SELECT /* (row_number() over(order by created )) as rowNum,*/ (select count(*) from documents where 1=1 ) as listLength, no, classification, title, user_id AS userId, use_yn AS useYn, file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath, file_size as fileSize, created, (SELECT value FROM code_detail WHERE key = classification AND group_id = 'DOCUMENTS_CLASSIFICATION') as classificationValue FROM DOCUMENTS WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY created DESC LIMIT 10 offset #{pageOffset}

SELECT , (SELECT value FROM code_detail WHERE key = classification AND group_id = 'DOCUMENTS_CLASSIFICATION') as classificationValue
FROM DOCUMENTS WHERE 1=1 AND NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENTS (title, user_id, classification, use_yn, content, file_name, file_path, file_size, created, lastmodified) values( #{title}, #{userId}, #{classification}, #{useYn}, #{content}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, now(), now() );
mapper.update:
/* Catalog.updateServicePackCatalog */ UPDATE DOCUMENTS SET
"title" = #{title},
user_id = #{userId},
classification = #{classification},
use_yn = #{useYn},
content = #{content},
file_name = #{fileName}, file_path = #{filePath}, file_size = #{fileSize},
lastModified = now() WHERE 1=1
AND "no" = #{no}
